alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Essex, northeastern Worcester and north central Middlesex Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westford, or near Chelmsford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Westford, Acton, Tyngsborough, Groton, Littleton, Boxford, Ayer, Harvard, Boxborough and Carlisle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
